Web Design 99 Conference

09 Aug 1999

Thunder Lizard Productions is putting on what is looking to be one of the best Web design conferences of the year.

\nSpetember 29th - October 1st in Denver CO, is when and where the action is with the keynote being delivered by Jeff Zeldman, creative director at A List Apart, and co-founder of The Web Standards Project. Lots of other big names will be there too, and the seminars on each day look to deliver pretty excellent content. Check out the official website for all the details!
